## Visualizações 

Visualizações e explorações de dados com R e ggplot2.


:::: {.grid data-masonry='{ "itemSelector": ".grid-item", "gutter": 0 }'}

```{r}
#| output: asis
#| echo: false


img_files <- fs::dir_ls("graph/graficos/")

legendas <- list.files(path = "graph/legendas/", full.names = T)



# cat(":::: {.grid data-masonry='{ 'itemSelector': '.grid-item', 'gutter': 0 }'}\n")
for (i in 1:length(img_files)) {
  
img_caption <- readr::read_file(legendas[i])

cat(glue::glue("
  :::{{.grid-item}}
  ![{img_caption}]({img_files[i]}){{group='sketches'}}
  :::"),
  sep = "\n"
)
}
# cat("::::")

```
